headline: How The Southern Company’s (SO) Dividend Resilience Makes it One of the Best Dividend Stocks to Buy Under $100
summary: The Southern Company (NYSE:SO) is included among the 13 Best High Dividend Stocks to Buy Under $100. The Southern Company (NYSE:SO) is a Georgia-based gas and electric utility holding company. In its latest earnings release, the company revealed that it had raised its five-year base capital plan by $13 billion, bringing the total to $76 […]
